questions.text: Which of the following was the tagline for "Commando"?
options: "A woman and a warrior that became a legend."
"The government gave him a raw deal."
questions.explanation:
"Somewhere...somehow...someone's going to pay."

	"Commando" stars Schwarzenegger as a retired military man who is sought after for one last job. His daughter, Jenny, played by Alyssa Milano, is kidnaped and he has only a matter of hours to find her and save her. This film also stars Rae Dawn Chong and David Patrick Kelly.

Yellow.

	He was driving a yellow Porsche. Matrix let him go over the cliff after he found out where to meet Cooke.

questions.text: What was the room number that Sully was supposed to meet Cooke in?
questions.explanation:
5.

	They were to meet at a sleazy little motel that normally had clients by the hour. Matrix and Cindy actually met him instead since Sully had been dropped over the cliff by Matrix.

questions.text: What was found in the glove box of Cooke's car?
questions.explanation:
Fuel receipt.

	Matrix and Cindy were looking through the cars to clues as to where they might find Jenny. Cindy came upon a fuel receipt in the glove box that showed fuel for a plane that can land and take off from the water.

questions.text: How did Cindy know how to use the rocket launcher?
options: She just guessed at how to use it.
She didn't use the rocket launcher.
questions.explanation:
She read the instructions.

	Matrix and Cindy were busted by the cops stealing supplies from a store. Cindy followed the police van and got Matrix out by using the rocket launcher to over turn the van.

questions.text: Dan Hedaya played the part of Arius in "Commando."  What popular 80s sitcom did he play Nick Tortelli?
questions.explanation:
Cheers.

	He played Carla's husband.  His role in "Commando" sure was a departure from the dimwitted Nick he played on "Cheers."

questions.text: Which popular 80s film did Rae Dawn Chong star in during the 1980s?
questions.explanation:
Soul Man.

	All of the other films mentioned in this multiple choice starred Rae Dawn's one time husband C. Thomas Howell. They were married in 1989. Their marriage lasted less than two years. She was married once before in 1982 to Owen Baylis and has one son. She is the daughter of Tommy Chong and Maxine Sneed.

questions.text: What popular 80s teen flick did Vernon Wells (Bennett) have a small part in 1985?
questions.explanation:
Weird Science.

	He played Lord General. The guy with the mohawk that scared Wyatt and Gary into real men.

questions.text: What was Alyssa Milano's character's name on the 1980s sitcom "Who's the Boss"?
questions.explanation:
Samantha Micelli.

	"Who's the Boss" ran on ABC from 1984-1992. It starred Tony Danza, Judith Light, Alyssa Milano, Danny Pintauro, and Katherine Helmond.

questions.text: Finally, let's end this thing with a question about Arnold Schwarzenegger.  What state was he elected governor of in 2003?
questions.explanation:
California.

	I had to end with an easy one. There has been so much press about this one, I don't know if anyone could get it wrong. Mr. Schwarzenegger will be taking a very long hiatus from film making to pursue his political career.
